DVD release: Platinum Disc released a budget DVD of the film in 2002.Shout! Factory announced they would release Cyclone as part of a four-film "Action-Packed Movie Marathon" DVD set on March 19, 2013.[1]
Plot: Rick has developed the ultimate motorcycle, the Cyclone. It is a $5 million bike equipped with rocket launchers and laser guns. Rick meets his fate and it is up to his girlfriend Teri to keep the Cyclone from falling into the wrong hands. Teri can trust no one but herself.
starring: Heather Thomas Jeffrey Combs Martin Landau
music_by: Haunted Garage David A. Jackson Michael Sonye
written_by: Paul Garson T.L. Lankford uncredited: Fred Olen Ray
